alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 22 at 5:43PM EDT until May 22 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Alabama and Panhandle Florida, including the following counties, in southeast Alabama, Geneva and Houston. In Panhandle Florida, Holmes and Jackson. * WHEN...Until 745 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen in the last 1 Hour. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Graceville, Dothan, Taylor, Slocomb, Malvern, Rehobeth, Madrid, Memphis, Merritts Crossroads, Southern Junction, Garretts Crossroads, Fadette, Light, Olympia Spa Resort, Browntown, Hodgesville, Cobb Crossroads and Keytons. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
